Performance_property.summary: The global performance property returns a object, which can be used to gather performance information about the context it is called in (window or worker).

remarks.para: Performance entries are per context. If you create a mark on the main thread (or other worker), you cannot see it in a worker thread, and vice versa.

Performance_property.value: A object offering access to performance and timing-related information for the context it is called on (window or worker).
